thread.title: SDS Humboldt Urges Cal Poly Humboldt to Adopt Ethical Investment Policy - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: SDS Humboldt Urges Cal Poly Humboldt to Adopt Ethical Investment Policy - NewsBreak

author: Staff
title: SDS Humboldt Urges Cal Poly Humboldt to Adopt Ethical Investment Policy - NewsBreak
text:
By Staff ,
33 minutes ago SDS Humboldt has sent out an ethical investment declaration to the Cal Poly Humboldt administration with the demand that they sign-on to it effective immediately. The declaration would prevent the administration from investing in anything that is tied to the U.S. Military Industrial Complex or weapons manufacturers and have them divest from all existing ties that are directly within their power. It is our belief that a university should be a place that encourages progressive ideas, peace, and justice. By tying itself financially to industries that only seek to kill vulnerable people, the university cannot be viewed as a progressive, or a neutral force. Read full article
Read in NewsBreak
